flaws.description: Thorne's self-image as a successful, respected man is his armor. Anything that threatens this image triggers an outsized reaction.
Elena's guilt about the affair makes her overly accommodating to Thorne, which paradoxically increases her stress.
Elena will go to great lengths to avoid direct conflict, preferring to flee or deflect.
Marcus doubles down when cornered. Rather than cutting losses, he escalates deceptions.
Marcus refuses to acknowledge the harm his actions cause. He rationalizes everything.
Lydia knows things that could blow the evening apart, but her fear of conflict keeps her silent.
Lydia's loyalty to Thorne means she'll endure personal risk to protect him, even when telling him the truth would cause a scene.
Diana feels guilty about her debt to Marcus and about keeping Elena's secret from Thorne. This guilt makes her over-accommodate everyone.
Diana envies Elena's comfortable life and Thorne's wealth, even as she sympathizes with Elena's unhappiness.
Victor's journalist instinct takes over when he smells a story. He'll push too hard, burn relationships, and ignore social cues in pursuit of the truth.
Victor values being seen as the smartest person in the room. He'll drop hints about what he knows to show off, even when discretion would serve him better.

secrets.description: Elena and Marcus are having a romantic affair behind Thorne's back.
secrets.reveal_consequences: Thorne's marriage and business partnership are both destroyed.

secrets.description: Marcus has been embezzling money from the business he shares with Thorne.
secrets.reveal_consequences: Marcus faces criminal charges. Thorne realizes double betrayal.

secrets.description: Diana owes Marcus a large sum of money.
Lydia has noticed financial discrepancies and suspects Marcus.
secrets.reveal_consequences: If Marcus learns, Lydia becomes a threat.

secrets.description: Victor is investigating Marcus for a journalistic expose.
secrets.reveal_consequences: Marcus discovers the investigation and reacts.

locations.name: Dining Table
locations.description: The main dining table. Seats six. The social center of the evening.

locations.name: Kitchen
locations.description: An open-plan kitchen adjacent to the dining area.

locations.name: Balcony
locations.description: A small balcony off the dining room. Private enough for real conversations.

locations.name: Bathroom
locations.description: A small bathroom down the hall. The most private space available.
